info.name: 5SRT Business Submissions API
info.description: Complete API collection for business submissions with level-up system

request.description: Get all available business categories for submission form

response.name: Success Response
response.body:
{
    "success": true,
    "data": [
        {
            "id": 1,
            "name": "Restaurants",
            "slug": "restaurants",
            "description": "Food and dining establishments",
            "icon_image": "/images/categories/restaurants.png",
            "color_code": "#FF6B6B"
        },
        {
            "id": 2,
            "name": "Hotels & Accommodation",
            "slug": "hotels-accommodation",
            "description": "Places to stay and lodging",
            "icon_image": "/images/categories/hotels.png",
            "color_code": "#4ECDC4"
        },
        {
            "id": 3,
            "name": "Healthcare",
            "slug": "healthcare",
            "description": "Medical and health services",
            "icon_image": "/images/categories/healthcare.png",
            "color_code": "#45B7D1"
        },
        {
            "id": 4,
            "name": "Shopping",
            "slug": "shopping",
            "description": "Retail stores and shopping centers",
            "icon_image": "/images/categories/shopping.png",
            "color_code": "#96CEB4"
        },
        {
            "id": 5,
            "name": "Education",
            "slug": "education",
            "description": "Schools, colleges, and educational institutions",
            "icon_image": "/images/categories/education.png",
            "color_code": "#FECA57"
        }
    ],
    "message": "Business categories retrieved successfully"
}

request.description: Submit a new business for admin review. Upon approval, user will receive points and potentially level up!

response.name: Success Response

body.raw:
{
    "name": "Green Leaf Restaurant",
